title: #282 Loving or Beloved?
itunes:title: #282 Loving or Beloved?
description:
Nikki witnessed some wild moments at the airport recently, one involved an aquamarine man and another one quite possibly herself. She asks Andrew if she went too far trying to assist someone on the TSA Clear line. Andrew knows he would go for a free hot dog on the sinking Titanic and Nikki wants to know what he wants inscribed on his tombstone. Nikki helps Andrew understand women's periods more. You Heard It Here First; quickies are a-okay. In Nikki's Reddit Dump they are inspired to give Besties a take home assignment - listen to this song by Hudson Mohawke while you make love and leave us a voicemail to let us know how it went. In the Final Thought Nikki gives shout outs to people who don't usually get them.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
